## READ THESE INSTRUCTIONS FIRST  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 441, 718, 456]]<|/det|>
Write your Centre number, candidate number and name on all the work you hand in.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 457, 320, 470]]<|/det|>
Write in dark blue or black pen.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 472, 465, 486]]<|/det|>
You may use a pencil for any diagrams or graphs.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 487, 598, 501]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 502, 380, 515]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 532, 254, 545]]<|/det|>
Answer all questions.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 546, 652, 560]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 561, 380, 574]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 575, 892, 604]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 605, 450, 618]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 635, 606, 649]]<|/det|>
